item.title: Advanced AI suffers 'complete accuracy collapse' in face of complex problems, study finds - The Guardian
item.description:
1. Advanced AI suffers 'complete accuracy collapse' in face of complex problems, study finds  The Guardian
  2. The Illusion of Thinking: Understanding the Strengths and Limitations of Reasoning Models via the Lens of Problem Complexity  Apple Machine Learning Research
  3. When billion-dollar AIs break down over puzzles a child can do, it's time to rethink the hype | Gary Marcus  The Guardian
  4. ‘A complete accuracy collapse’: Apple throws cold water on the potential of AI reasoning – and it's a huge blow for the likes of OpenAI, Google, and Anthropic  IT Pro
  5. 'The illusion of thinking': Apple research finds AI models collapse and give up with hard puzzles  Mashable

item.title: What Happens When People Don’t Understand How AI Works - The Atlantic
item.description:
1. What Happens When People Don’t Understand How AI Works  The Atlantic
  2. Scariest AI reality: Companies don't fully understand their models  Axios
  3. 'Foolhardy at best, and deceptive and dangerous at worst': Don't believe the hype — here's why artificial general intelligence isn't what the billionaires tell you it is  Live Science
  4. AI's biggest threat isn't what you'd think - here's how to protect yourself  ZDNET
  5. The Best Thing About AI? It Still Needs You to Make It Work  Lifewire
